item.description: Hi All, The weather is supposed to be great Sunday, so this meetup is ON! If you want to roller-blade, be there at 9am, or come to bike ride at 10am. Round trip bike ride is about 14 miles, that will be cake if there is little wind, I can't wait to get out there in the sunshine and beutiful scenery, I hope to see you all on Sunday, bring your freinds, and if you haven't rsvp come anyway, it's your group! My tel is 508 525 2719 if your coming late or lost We are meeting at the RAIL ROAD BRIDGE mapquest gives a slightly different location, but I know you will see the railroad bridge. If you don't know me, I will be wearing a headband, and I'll be looking for you if your a new member, or an old member that does'nt know me.I'll be near the bathrooms, on the path on the benches. OK, Need more cool pix of the members of this group having a good time, so I'll see you Sunday! Rich
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot near restrooms near the Rail Road Bridge
item.name: Roller Blade and Bike Ride
